```{r data-load, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(dplyr); library(ggplot2)

id = "m0d4TKcAAAAJ&hl"
pubs = scholar::get_publications(id) %>%
  filter(journal != "ACU Research Bank") %>% 
  arrange(desc(year), desc(cites))

title = pubs$title %>% as.character %>% tolower %>% tools::toTitleCase()
title = gsub("Audit-c", "AUDIT-C", title)
journal = pubs$journal %>% as.character %>%  tools::toTitleCase()
year = pubs$year
authors = pubs$author %>% 
  gsub("J Conigrave", "JH Conigrave",.) %>% 
  gsub("JH Conigrave","**JH Conigrave**",.)

res = glue::glue("### {title}

{journal}

N/A

{year}

{authors}


")

 citations = scholar::get_citation_history(id)
 h_index = scholar::predict_h_index(id)[1,2]

CRAN_downloads = cranlogs::cran_downloads(c("corx","Conigrave"), from = "2015-01-01", to = lubridate::today()) %>% 
  group_by(package) %>% 
  summarise(dls = sum(count))

```

### Researcher --- Motivation, substance use and public health
